titles.title: Tax Relief for Transportation Workers Act of 2009
Tax Relief for Transportation Workers Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax relief for obtaining transportation worker identification credentials.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Tax Relief for Transportation Workers Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow individual taxpayers a refundable tax credit for the cost of obtaining a transportation worker identification credential; and (2) allow such credit for expenses incurred in prior taxable years beginning after 2006.
